entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
